1.text: A Song or Psalm of David. O God, my heart is fixed; I will sing and give praise, even with my glory.

2.text: Awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.

3.text: I will praise thee, O LORD, among the people: and I will sing praises unto thee among the nations.

4.text: For thy mercy is great above the heavens: and thy truth reacheth unto the clouds.

5.text: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: and thy glory above all the earth;

6.text: That thy beloved may be delivered: save with thy right hand, and answer me.

7.text: God hath spoken in his holiness; I will rejoice, I will divide Shechem, and mete out the valley of Succoth.

8.text: Gilead is mine; Manasseh is mine; Ephraim also is the strength of mine head; Judah is my lawgiver;

9.text: Moab is my washpot; over Edom will I cast out my shoe; over Philistia will I triumph.

10.text: Who will bring me into the strong city? who will lead me into Edom?

11.text: Wilt not thou, O God, who hast cast us off? and wilt not thou, O God, go forth with our hosts?

12.text: Give us help from trouble: for vain is the help of man.

13.text: Through God we shall do valiantly: for he it is that shall tread down our enemies.
